name: Diderik van Wingerden
cooked:
Dear OSHWA people,

For several months I have been trying to reach someone of your organization. I am having difficulty posting to the OSHWA mailing list. Mailing to admin@ and to the admins individually gets me no response. E-mailing Addie Wagenknecht neither.

Is there anyone there who could help me out?

Thanks in advance!
raw:
Dear OSHWA people,

For several months I have been trying to reach someone of your organization. I am having difficulty posting to the OSHWA mailing list. Mailing to admin@ and to the admins individually gets me no response. E-mailing Addie Wagenknecht neither.

Is there anyone there who could help me out?

Thanks in advance!
